update.id: get非課税年金対象者情報

mapper.update: UPDATE rgdb."DbT4037HikazeNenkinTaishosha" SET "genkisonenkinno" = A."genKisoNennkinnNo", "hihokenshano" = A."hihokenshaNo" FROM "HikazeNenkinTaishoshaDouteiResultJohoTempTable" as A WHERE A."douteiResultKubun" = '1' AND "dtnenkinhokenshacode" = A."dtNennkinnHokenshaCode" AND "dtsakuseiymd" = A."dtCreateYMD" AND "dtkisonenkinno" = A."dtKisoNennkinnNo" AND "dtnenkincode" = A."dtNennkinnCode" AND "dttaishoy" = A."dtTaisyoYear"
